OOC: Kinger approved this as long as he doesn't enter a battle.

::Cygnar::
    "Yes, well, we shall see."  He grinned and got up to get some food.  When 
he got back and sat down, he began to speak again.  "Now we must plan our 
assault.  I recommend a wedge formation with the most heavily armored bot 
taking point.  That way we won't be hitting ourselves."  Something registered 
in his mind.  "I have to go to the old base.  To see if there's anything to 
salvage."

    He leapt to his feet and ran out of the base.  Outside, he flew off to 
the destroyed Sulaco.  He wasn't sure what he was looking for but he quickly 
found it.  An egg was sitting on the ground buried under some light rubble.  
"Interesting."  He picked it up and flew back to the new Destron base.  He 
left the egg on an examining table and began studying it.
